description: Deploy an instant single-page app (SPA) on IBM Cloud Object Storage. Paste or upload your HTML and get a live app immediately. Don't worry, it comes with a default sample!

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region to deploy your SPA. Don't worry, default is 'us-south'.

variables.name: cos_name
variables.description: COS instance name to host your vibe-coded app. Don't worry, a default name is prefilled.

variables.name: bucket_name
variables.description: Bucket name where your SPA will live. Don't worry, a default bucket is prefilled.

variables.name: make_public
variables.description: Whether the COS bucket should be public. Default is false.

variables.name: sample_app_html
variables.description: Optional HTML content for the default SPA. Leave empty to use preloaded sample.
